# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Environment files
.env
*.env

# Virtual environments
venv/
env/
.venv/

# IDE specific files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# Logs
*.log

# Package distribution / packaging
dist/
build/
*.egg-info/

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
